articles.title: Morrisons customers fume over new ban coming to all stores: 'Stop the greed!' - Express
articles.description: MORRISONS has become the first supermarket in the UK to ban all plastic bags from its stores. The retailer has announced that it will scrap plastic bags and ask customers to use alternatives that cost a minimum of 30p each.
articles.content: The change will come into force in every Morrisons supermarket in the UK. It is the next step in the company’s bid to reduce single-use plastic. The paper bag alternatives have been tested to hold up… [+2973 chars]
